apiKey.description: Vibe Index API key (vibe_live_*). Get one at https://vibeindex.ai/developer

autoRecommend.description: Automatically recommend skills when a capability is missing

maxResults.description: Maximum number of skill recommendations to show

searchOnly.description: When true, vibeclaw_install is disabled. Only search and trending are available. Use this to prevent auto-installation.

allowedPublishers.description: GitHub usernames/orgs allowed to install from. If set, only skills from these publishers can be installed. Example: ["steipete", "openclaw"]
